channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 22:36 Air alert in Donetsk region. Follow further messages.
item.description: 🔴 22:36 Air alert in Donetsk region. Follow further messages. #Donetsk_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🔴 22:27 Air alert in Kyiv region. Stay tuned for further messages.

item.title: 🔴 22:17 Threat of artillery shelling! Now there is artillery shelling in the Chervonohryhorivska territorial community. Take cover!
item.description: 🔴 22:17 Threat of artillery shelling! Now there is artillery shelling in the Chervonohryhorivska territorial community. Take cover! #Chervonohryhorivska_territorial_community This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🔴 21:59 Threat of artillery shelling! Now in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community there is artillery shelling. Go to shelter!
item.description: 🔴 21:59 Threat of artillery shelling! Now in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community there is artillery shelling.
